  • E-commerce

    An e-commerce website is an online platform for buying and selling products or services, facilitating transactions over the internet.

  • StoryTelling

    A storytelling website is an online platform that hosts and shares diverse narratives, engaging users with captivating stories in various forms.

  • Showcase

    A showcase website is an online space for displaying and highlighting creative work, portfolios, or products to present one's skills or offerings.

  • Corporative

    A corporate website serves as a digital hub for a company, providing information about its business, services, products, and brand identity.
